info.description: BeatPass uses cookie-based session authentication via Laravel Sanctum. Authenticate by logging in at `/auth/login` after obtaining a CSRF token from `/sanctum/csrf-cookie`. Session cookies are automatically included in subsequent requests by the browser.
info.title: BeatPass API

get.summary: Get information about albums, artists, playlists, tracks or users that match a keyword string.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of item types to search across. Valid types are: album , artist, playlist, track, and user. Search results include hits from all the specified types.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return. The limit is applied within each type, not on the total response.

200.description: For each type provided in the type parameter, the response body contains an array of artist, album, track, playlist and user objects in JSON.
Response body contains a playlist object in JSON format.

totalDuration.description: Total duration of all playlist tracks in milliseconds

post.summary: Create a Playlist for current user

description.description: Short description (between 20 and 170 chracaters) for playlist

public.description: Whether this playlist will be set as public

collaborative.description: Whether this playlist will be set as collaborative

200.description: On success, the response body contains the created playlist object in JSON format

description.description: Short description (between 20 and 170 chracaters) for playlist

public.description: Whether this playlist will be set as public

collaborative.description: Whether this playlist will be set as collaborative

200.description: On success, the response body contains the updated playlist object in JSON format

get.summary: Get full details of playlist tracks

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many tracks to return per page

200.description: Response body contains a paginated list of playlist tracks in JSON format.

post.summary: Add one or more tracks to a user's playlist

ids.description: Array of track ID's to add to this playlist

200.description: Response body contains a playlist object in JSON format.

post.summary: Remove one or more tracks from a user's playlist

ids.description: Array of track ID's to remove from this playlist

200.description: Response body contains a playlist object in JSON format.

post.summary: Follow specified playlist with current user
Unfollow specified playlist with current user

parameters.name: with
parameters.description: Comma separated list of additional data to fetch for this artist. Supported values: similar, genres, albums, topTracks.

200.description: Response body contains an artist object in JSON format.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many tracks to return per page

200.description: Response body contains a paginated list of artist tracks in JSON format.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many tracks to return per page

200.description: Response body contains a paginated list of artist albums in JSON format.

get.summary: Get all users that follow specified artist

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many tracks to return per page

200.description: Response body contains a paginated list of users that follow specified artist

parameters.name: with
parameters.description: Comma separated list of additional data to fetch for this album. Supported values: tags, genres, artists, tracks.

200.description: Response body contains an album object in JSON format.

parameters.name: with
parameters.description: Comma separated list of additional data to fetch for this track. Supported values: tags, genres, artists, album.

200.description: Response body contains a track object in JSON format.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many comments to return per page

200.description: Response body contains a paginated list of track comments in JSON format.
Response body contains a lyric object for specified track

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many tracks to return per page

200.description: Response body contains a paginated list of tracks for specified tag in JSON format.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many albums to return per page

200.description: Response body contains a paginated list of albums for specified tag in JSON format.
Response body contains a paginated list of all existing genres in JSON format.

get.summary: Get public profile information about a user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user or "me" for currently logged in user.

200.description: Response body contains a user object in JSON format.

get.summary: List tracks current user has liked

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many tracks to return per page

200.description: Response body contains a paginated list of tracks user has liked in JSON format.

get.summary: List albums current user has liked

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many tracks to return per page

200.description: Response body contains a paginated list of albums user has liked in JSON format.

get.summary: List artists current user has liked

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many tracks to return per page

200.description: Response body contains a paginated list of artists user has liked in JSON format.

get.summary: List playlists current user has followed or created

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many tracks to return per page

200.description: Response body contains a paginated list of playlists user has liked in JSON format.

get.summary: List users that are following current user

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many items to return per page

200.description: Response body contains a paginated list of users that are following current user

get.summary: List users that current user is currently following

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many items to return per page

200.description: Response body contains a paginated list of users that current user is currently following

post.description: Logs in the specified user and creates a session. Returns the user object. For SPA authentication, first call `/sanctum/csrf-cookie` to get a CSRF token, then include it in the `X-XSRF-TOKEN` header. Session cookies are automatically managed by the browser.

post.summary: Generate a license certificate for a track

usage_terms.description: Terms of usage for the license

get.summary: Check license status for a track
Verify a license certificate by UUID

post.summary: Generate audio fingerprint for a track
Check for duplicate tracks using fingerprinting
Invite a user to collaborate on a playlist
Remove an editor from a collaborative playlist
Toggle repost status for a track
Initiate a track purchase via Stripe

get.summary: Check purchase status for a track

200.description: Dashboard data including XP, level, achievements

get.summary: Check if current user follows an artist

post.summary: Add a track to user's library
Remove a track from user's library

get.summary: Get waveform data for a track

200.description: List of conversations with last message and unread count

post.summary: Start a new conversation (direct or group)

user_id.description: Recipient user ID for direct message

post.summary: Send a message to a conversation

delete.summary: Delete conversation for the authenticated user

200.description: Financial overview with balance and transactions

post.summary: Validate a coupon code and calculate discount

200.description: Coupon validation result with discount details

get.summary: Get remaining upload minutes for a user's plan

minutesLeft.description: Minutes remaining, null if no limit

image_small.description: Small image for artist, usually 320x320px in size.

verified.description: Whether artist has been verified by SITE_NAME staff

image.description: Artwork image for album, usually 300x300px in size

release_date.description: Release date of the album in YYYY-MM-DD format

name.example: Hey Hey What Can I Do

release_date.description: Release date of the album in YYYY-MM-DD format

image.description: Artwork image for album, usually 300x300px in size

artists.description: List of artists who performed the track

sessionAuth.name: laravel_session
sessionAuth.description: Cookie-based session authentication via Laravel Sanctum. Authenticate by calling GET /sanctum/csrf-cookie then POST /auth/login.

Response401.description: Unauthenticated. Session cookie is missing, invalid, or expired. Re-authenticate via the login flow.

Response403.description: Unauthorized access. You don't have permissions required to perform this operation.

Response404.description: Resource not found. Could not find a resource with specified name or ID.
